_description: The sixth line of a much-effaced 10-line poem on the Annunciation, written in pencil in a thirteenth-century hand

CULKk418.First Lines:
…Also þe stonden þer to d[ ] a s[ ]herth þat
                    spa[ ] hem an seidþ[ ] men [ ]gthles werlde hare
                    þral…
CULKk418.Last Lines:
…ing into þe blisse a[ ] þen saidenQuis est
                        ille[ ]
